redirectionMessage.label_one: In 1 second, you will be automatically redirected to your shop to finish the setup of the integration.
redirectionMessage.label_other: In {{count}} seconds, you will be automatically redirected to your shop to finish the setup of the integration.

description.label: The integration manages your Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts on your behalf. After you have uploaded your products to your Merchant Center account and set up your billing information in your Google Ads account, you can use the integration to easily create a campaign in your shop administration. As the integration is connected to your Google accounts, you can also conveniently track your campaign there.
Connect your shop to a Merchant Center account and upload your shop and product data to Google. You can either use an existing account or simply create a new one without even leaving your shop.
Upload the products you want to promote to Google. Changes you make to your products will be automatically synchronised.
Create a Google Ads account directly from your shop administration to manage your campaigns and campaign data.
Create a Performance Max campaign and showcase your products to millions of shoppers across Google Search, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and the Display Network.
View the number of conversions and the revenue your campaign generates for you directly in your shop administration.
Use the performance report to keep an overview of the benefits and costs of your campaign and evaluate its success.

copyrightNotice.label: Â© ePages GmbH 2021. All rights reserved.

tagline.label: With this integration, you can easily create a Performance Max campaign to advertise your products on Google and keep track of their performance comfortably within your shop administration. Performance Max campaigns combine your product feed and Google's machine learning to achieve the best possible results. The campaign learns and improves continuously, helping you to reach more online shoppers and maximize your sales revenue. Get started by signing in with Google.
